news.title: Chris Mason: Spending Review is a gamble on patience in an era of impatience
news.summary: The big bet for the government remains on economic growth - finding it and sustaining it.

news.title: Fire at leisure centre as Northern Ireland violence erupts for third night
news.summary: The worst of the disorder is in Ballymena, but unrest spread to other towns on Wednesday evening.

news.summary: The touts alleged staff at resale sites Ticketmaster once owned helped them trade in bulk, the BBC reveals.

news.summary: Lady Diana Brittan says her falsely accused late husband's legacy has been permanently tarnished.

news.summary: The move comes as US talks over Iran's nuclear programme appear to have stalled in recent days.

news.title: 'Brave and beautiful people' remembered in Aids quilt display
